name: cmykay
description:
Made for the Itching to Scratch game jam but completed too late. Made entirely within the span of about 6 hours, in scratch

Control circular mage Kay as he(?) uses colored liquid explosions to damage waves of monsters.

PRESS GREEN FLAG TO PLAY!

Controls in the game.

Cyan, Magenta, and Yellow monsters are healed by the amount of their own color in your spell, and damaged by the other colors in your spell.

Whether a spell is considered warm or cool is determined by whether it is more Cyan or Yellow.

Hopefully you should be able to tell if a spell is bright or dark.

It's not balanced at all, idk if its easy or impossible.

Background made using ptdesigner by drummyfish
